updates.content:
We are experiencing an elevated error rate on image rendering from our partner Imgix.

They have a case open on their status page that you can follow: https://status.imgix.com/incidents/n77l9lgsk15k
The Imgix team has put in place a mitigation for the problem. Keep following on their page: https://status.imgix.com/incidents/n77l9lgsk15k
The issue has been identified and the resolution is in progress.
